column4: Can anyone confirm whether it's normal or a bug that "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" does nothing and returns with no output on my system?
if it succeeds it will output nothing
Succeeds in doing what?  I'm trying to change my screen resolution, and I've read that running that command is supposed to let me enable higher resolutions... but it doesn't.
I seem to recall it setting up xorg.conf but I could be wrong
